name: Abra
fact: Abra spends most of its time sleeping and uses its psychic powers to detect danger.

name: Kadabra
fact: Kadabra's psychic powers are so strong that it can bend spoons with its mind.

name: Alakazam
fact: Alakazam has an IQ of 5000 and can use its psychic abilities to predict its opponent's moves.

name: Machops
fact: Machops can lift heavy objects and use its psychic abilities to enhance its strength.

name: Machamps
fact: Machamps is known for its immense physical strength and can wield its psychic powers to deliver powerful blows.

name: Metatite
fact: Metatite has the ability to use psychic powers in combination with its fighting skills, enhancing its battle prowess.

name: Metacham
fact: Metacham can use its psychic abilities to sense its opponent's movements and plan its attacks accordingly.

name: Jynx
fact: Jynx uses its psychic powers to create intense cold and freeze its opponents.

name: Espeon
fact: Espeon evolves from Eevee and is known for its strong psychic abilities and keen senses.

name: Uxie
fact: Uxie is known as the 'Being of Knowledge' and is said to have given humans the gift of knowledge.

name: Mesprit
fact: Mesprit is known as the 'Being of Emotion' and is said to have given humans emotions.

name: Azelf
fact: Azelf is known as the 'Being of Willpower' and is said to have given humans the drive to pursue their goals.

name: Galarian Slowbro
fact: Galarian Slowbro's psychic abilities are amplified by the toxic shell it carries.

name: Galarian Slowking
fact: Galarian Slowking's psychic powers are enhanced by the presence of the toxic shell on its head.
